subject: YOUR PAYMENT UPDATE
body:
Attn  Monique

Thanks for your update as its well noted. Please urgently contact the
payment verification officer Barrister Jeffery. Davies on this email

id  libertychambersconsultants@gmail.com


   Please  i want you to urgently contact the lawyer Jeffery. Davies now
with  your correctcoordinates so he can perfect the documents and he will
tell you what that is needed so that you can get your approved fund to
avoid any diversion of your payment by this suspect. The lawyer has
promised to get him arrested. so contact him for your payment as soon as
possible.

 Keep me posted and accept our congratulations in advance. God bless you.


Sincerely,
  Dr Mrs Rita Smith

subject: Re: YOUR PAYMENT UPDATE
body:
Hello Monique,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your concern about the potential diversion of my payment. Could you please provide me with more information about Barrister Jeffery Davies? What is his role in this process, and how can he help ensure that my approved fund is not diverted?

Additionally, I would like to know what documents need to be perfected and why they are necessary for the payment process. It's important for me to understand all the details before proceeding.

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Monique

subject: Re: YOUR PAYMENT UPDATE
body:
Dear monique,
Please the insurance fee is to notify the apex bank and your receiving bank
that your fund is legal and covered with an insurance clearance
certificate. Please, the document is needed so that it will signify the
genuity of your payment before your approved fund can be transfer so pay
for the insurance certificate to the account bellow to enable the document
to be obtained before your approved fund transfer into your account.

  BANK NAME. DISCOVER BANK
ACCOUNT NAME RAFAEL LOPEZ
ACCOUNT NUMBER. 7049409519
ROUTING NUMBER 031100649
SWIFT CODE DISOUS61
ACCOUNT ADDRESS. 6338 HEATH RIDGE
CT, CHARLOTTE,NC,28210
BANK ADDRESS.217 BRANNER AVENUE WAYNESVILLE,NC,
Regards
Mrs Smith
